subject: Boxing
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: In John Dower’s new documentary “Thrilla in Manila,” a look back at the third fight in the Frazier-Ali trilogy, Joe Frazier watches the 14-round epic for the first time.
snippet: In John Dower’s new documentary “Thrilla in Manila,” a look back at the third fight in the Frazier-Ali trilogy, Joe Frazier watches the 14-round epic for the first time.
